name: Watiqay
title: OWASP Watiqay
pitch: Watiqay is a Quechua word (indigenous language of Peru), which means observe or monitor and is exactly what characterizes this tool.

name: Amass
title: OWASP Amass
pitch: An advanced open source tool to help information security professionals perform network mapping of attack surfaces and external asset discovery using open source information gathering and active reconnaissance techniques!

name: Cheat Sheets
title: OWASP Cheat Sheet Series
pitch: The OWASP Cheat Sheet Series project provides a set of concise good practice guides for application developers and defenders to follow.

name: Defectdojo
title: OWASP Defectdojo
pitch: The leading open source application vulnerability management tool built for DevOps and continuous security integration.

name: Dependency Check
title: OWASP Dependency-Check
pitch: Dependency-Check is a Software Composition Analysis (SCA) tool suite that identifies project dependencies and checks if there are any known, publicly disclosed, vulnerabilities.

name: Dependency Track
title: OWASP Dependency-Track
pitch: Intelligent Supply Chain Component Analysis platform that allows organizations to identify and reduce risk from the use of third-party and open source components.

name: Juice Shop
title: OWASP Juice Shop
pitch: Probably the most modern and sophisticated insecure web application for security trainings, awareness demos and CTFs. Also great voluntary guinea pig for your security tools and DevSecOps pipelines!

name: Maryam
title: OWASP Maryam
pitch: OWASP Maryam is an Open-Source intelligence(OSINT) and Web-Based Footprinting optional/modular framwork based on Recon-ng core and written in Python. If you have Skill in OWASP Maryam is a modular/optional open source framework based on OSINT and data gathering. Maryam is written in Python programming language and It’s designed to provide a powerful environment to harvest data from open sources and search engines and collect data quickly and thoroughly. If you have skill in Metasploit or Recon-ng, you can easily use it without prerequisites and if not, it’s easy to use.

name: Owtf
title: OWASP OWTF
pitch: Offensive Web Testing Framework (OWTF), is an OWASP+PTES focused try to unite great tools and make pen testing more efficient, written mostly in Python.

name: Security Qualitative Metrics
title: OWASP Security Qualitative Metrics
pitch: The OWASP Security Qualitative Metrics is the most detailed list of metrics which evaluate security level of web projects. It shows the level of coverage of OWASP ASVS.

name: Top Ten
title: OWASP Top Ten
pitch: The OWASP Top 10 is the reference standard for the most critical web application security risks. Adopting the OWASP Top 10 is perhaps the most effective first step towards changing your software development culture focused on producing secure code.

name: Web Security Testing Guide
title: OWASP Web Security Testing Guide
pitch: The Web Security Testing Guide (WSTG) Project produces the premier cybersecurity testing resource for web application developers and security professionals.

name: Zap
title: OWASP ZAP
pitch: The OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP) is one of the world’s most popular free security tools and is actively maintained by a dedicated international team of volunteers. Great for pentesters, devs, QA, and CI/CD integration.

name: Antisamy
title: OWASP AntiSamy
pitch: AntiSamy is a Java component that can sanitize HTML/CSS to eliminate potentially malicious JavaScript.

name: Automated Threats To Web Applications
title: OWASP Automated Threats to Web Applications

name: Benchmark
title: OWASP Benchmark
pitch: The OWASP Benchmark Project is a Java test suite designed to evaluate the accuracy, coverage, and speed of automated software vulnerability detection tools.

name: Android Security Inspector Toolkit
title: OWASP Android Security Inspector Toolkit
pitch: A very brief, one-line description of your project

name: Apicheck
title: OWASP APICheck
pitch: The DevSecOps toolset for HTTP APIs

name: Appsec Pipeline
title: OWASP Appsec Pipeline
pitch: The AppSec Pipeline is a resource for AppSec teams to learn the best methods of adding automation and continual testing to an AppSec / Product Security / DevSecOps program.

name: Big Data
title: OWASP Big Data Security Verification Standard
pitch: The goal of this project is to provide security requirements for Big Data applications

name: Cloud Native Security Project
title: OWASP Cloud-Native Security Project
pitch: A top-level project to unite all that is Cloud-Native security

name: Core Business Application Security
title: OWASP Core Business Application Security
pitch: A very brief, one-line description of your project

name: Cyber Controls Matrix
title: OWASP Cyber Controls Matrix (OCCM)
pitch: Solve the problem of multiple cyber standards by consolidating them, reducing timelines and effort by months!

name: Cyber Scavenger Hunt
title: OWASP Cyber Scavenger Hunt
pitch: A simple scavenger hunt to learn about pentesting a website or web application.

name: Find Security Bugs
title: OWASP Find Security Bugs
pitch: Find Security Bugs is a SpotBugs plugin for security audits of Java web applications and Android applications.

name: Go Secure Coding Practices Guide
title: OWASP Go Secure Coding Practices Guide

name: O Saft
title: OWASP O-Saft
pitch: O-Saft is an easy to use tool to show informations about SSL certificate and tests the SSL connection according given list of ciphers and various SSL configurations.

name: Ontology Driven Threat Modeling Framework
title: OWASP Ontology Driven Threat Modeling Framework
pitch: OWASP Ontology-driven Threat Modelling (OdTM) framework is a set of means for implementation of an ontological approach into automatic threat modelling of computer systems.

title: OWASP Pygoat

name: Sectudo

name: Securecodebox

pitch: Automate all your security and vulnerability scanners.

name: Secureflag Community Edition

name: Securityrat
title: OWASP SecurityRAT
pitch: OWASP SecurityRAT is a tool used by development teams, helping them master security requirements during development.

name: Software Component Verification Standard
title: OWASP Software Component Verification Standard
pitch: SCVS is a framework for identifying activities, controls, and best practices, which can help in identifying and reducing risk in a software supply chain.

name: Sso
title: OWASP Single Sign-On
pitch: Centralize your decentral logins with the safest and most privacy-oriented Single Sign-On experience. Keep the data where it belongs - in your hands!

name: Threat Dragon
title: OWASP Threat Dragon
pitch: OWASP Threat Dragon provides a threat modelling application for teams implementing the STRIDE approach, either as a desktop or as a web application. Great for both developers and defenders alike

name: Timegap Theory

pitch: An auto-scoring capture-the-flag game focusing on TOCTOU vulnerabilities

name: Vulnerable Web Applications Directory
title: OWASP Vulnerable Web Applications Directory
pitch: The OWASP Vulnerable Web Applications Directory Project (VWAD) is a comprehensive and well maintained registry of all known vulnerable web applications currently available for legal security and vulnerability testing of various kinds.

name: Asvs Graph
title: OWASP ASVS-Graph
pitch: OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) is a great knowledgebase. This greatly helps organizations by providing guidance as well as in generating Application Security Metrics. With OWASP ASVS-Graph, ASVS is converted to a knowledge-graph derived deep and unexplored relationships with the ASVS Data.
